name: crime city (itch)
description:
TUTORIAL download the map and the acces for 1.000.000 $ in the game

INSTRUCTIONS

for take a screenshot and download it press the space bar

player

WASD to move
press F for use the phone
left mouse button to shoot
when you buy  the rope, if you hold down the right mouse button just go over people to tie them

car

go to the car to use it
press E tu exit of the car
WASD to drive
